El Señor Winsor, curso solo hasta el nivel primario, es padre de un hijo al cual apoya y ayuda en su educación junto a su pareja, ellos son de bajos recursos, su pareja se dedica a la venta de ropa ambulante con lo cual genera un poco de ingreso para el sustento de su familia, el se dedica al servicio de venta de lomito en el restaurante LOS AMIGOS en la localidad de Ivirgarzama este es un restaurante que vende platos populares, es un lugar estratégico porque es una parada de flotas  y la demanda de pasajeros es regular, el señor Winsor trabaja hace más de 6 años demostrando experiencia en su actividad, el trabaja para mantener a su familia y darles lo mejor.
Es la primera vez que el cliente obtiene un préstamo de nuestra institución cuyo destino será la compra de mercadería para una venta de ropa donde su pareja podrá ofrecer sus productos y así  ayudar con algún ingreso a su familia.
Winsor y su pareja son personas emprendedoras que están siempre en busca de generar mejor estabilidad económica para brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su hijo.
texts.en:
Winsor only finished elementary school.  He is the father of a son who he supports and helps to educate together with his spouse.  They are of limited resources.  His spouse is a clothes street vendor which generates a bit of family income.  He sells “lomito” (pork sandwiches) at the Los Amigos Restaurant in Ivirgarzama.  This is a restaurant that sells popular dishes located in a strategic spot that’s a stop for transport lines and demand from passengers is constant.  Winsor has worked for over 6 years so has experience in the area.  He works to support his family and to give them the best.

This is the first time the client has gotten a loan from our institution.  It’s destined to buy merchandise so his spouse can sell clothes and help the family with a bit of income.

Winsor and his spouse are enterprising people always looking to generate better economic stability to provide a better quality of life for his son.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Rita

texts.en: Rita is a hairdresser selling hair products in Ankwanda, a village near Elmina. She is married and has four children. Her husband is a laborer and Rita helps him in providing for their home. Her loan will be used to buy creams, hair extensions and other items. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to build a salon.

loans.use: to buy creams, hair extensions and other items.

loans.name: Mwanajuma

texts.en:
Mwanajuma is a married woman with 4 children; two of her children attend school and two are still young for school. She owns a house that has no electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees.

For the past 5 years, Mwanajuma has operated a firewood sales business, selling from home to her neighbors and passersby. She also makes table mats as another source of livelihood. Mwanajuma faces a major challenge of seasonality. During the rainy season, it becomes difficult to get firewood for sale. 

Mwanajuma wants to use this KES 15,000 laon to purchase bundles of maize flour, crates of tomatoes and sacks of coconuts. Mwanajuma dreams of expanding her business and establishing a retail shop in the future. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: To purchase maize flour, tomatoes and coconuts.

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es: El señor Gerardo vive en Belén a 30 Km de Santa Rita. Esta casado con la Sra.  Martina y tiene 5 hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar, el Sr. Gerardo es agricultor y sus hijos también le ayudan se dedican a la agricultura y siembra de papa, maíz, yuca y tienen plantas de guineo con el dinero del crédito comprara semillas para la siembra de sus productos y también lo utilizara en lo que es el preparado de la tierra par la siembra. Él Sr. Gerardo nació en Chuquisaca el 30 de Septiembre de 1977 hace 10 años que él vino de Chuquisaca porque lograron conseguir una parcela en Santa Cruz, ya que se vinieron buscando un mejor futuro para el y su familia, es un apersona muy trabajadora agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Gerardo lives in Belén, 30 kilometers from Santa Rita.  He’s married to Martina and has five children who are school aged.  Gerardo’s a farmer and his children also help him to farm.  They farm potato, corn and manioc and also have plantain plants.  He will use the money from the loan to buy seeds for his plantings and also will use it to prepare the soil for planting.

Gerardo was born in Chuquisaca on 30 September 1977.  Ten years ago he moved here from Chuquisaca because they managed to acquire a parcel of land in Santa Cruz having come here seeking a better future for himself and his family.  He is a very hard working person who is grateful to the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: to clear the fields and plant corn.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
El señor Juan Carlos tiene treinta años, tres hijos de 5, 3 y 1 años dependientes de sus ingresos, sólo ha estudiado la primaria,  actualmente  viven en el sud de la ciudad de Cochabamba en la zona de la maica, una zona periurbana.
Necesita capital de operación para su actividad que es la de confección de colchones de resorte, necesita fierro, tela, resortes, algodón y esponja, el deseo del Sr. Juan Carlos es crecer en esta actividad, el sr. Juan Carlos tiene una experiencia de un año y medio confeccionando colchones,  porque él antes trabajaba en zona franca transformando autos y esta actividad se cerró.  En la actualidad desarrolla la confección de colchones en la zona de la tamborada.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos is 30 years old.  He has three children who are 5, 3, and 1 year of age and who are dependent on him.  He only finished elementary school.  He currently lives in the south part of the city of Cochabamba in the La Maica zone, a periurban zone.

He needs operational capital for his activity which is spring mattress making.  He needs felt, fabric, springs, cotton and foam.  Juan Carlos’ wish is to grown in this activity.  He has been making mattresses for a year and a half because he used to work in the tax free zone rebuilding cars but this business closed.  Currently he is making mattresses in the La Tamborada zone.

loans.use: to buy mattress making supplies.

loans.name: Mwanakombo

texts.en:
Mwanakombo is a married woman with eight children; three attend school while five have already graduated from school. Mwanakombo owns a house that has no electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

For the past 2 years, Mwanakombo has operated a business making mats, selling from home to her neighbors and passersby. Mwanakombo faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. During the rainy season, the availability of materials for her weaving business is minimal. Mwanakombo wants to use this KES 20,000 loan to purchase weaving materials for her business. She dreams of expanding her business in the future. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: To purchase weaving materials for her business.

loans.name: Miriam Yanceli

texts.es:
Los deseos de Miriam de progresar han sido el motor que la impulsan a trabajar día a día, ella vende de mercancía, la cual se ha convertido de gran ayuda puesto que debe generar ingresos debido a que su familia cuenta con bajos recursos económicos, a sus 29 años de edad Miriam es madre de 6 hijos a quienes ha querido brindarles la mejor calidad de vida.

Miriam es una luchadora que a pesar de haber tenido dificultades de orden público ha salido adelante y enfrentado la adversidad con mucha tenacidad, sueña con poder comprar en un futuro una moto que le facilite su labor y le permita poder tener mas ventas y así proporcionalmente ir aumentando sus ingresos. Sin embargo en este momento Miriam solicita un préstamo con el cual comprar mas mercancía y así poder tener más productos que ofrecerles a sus clientes, logrando un posicionamiento frente a los otros vendedores que están en el sector.
texts.en:
Miriam’s wish to progress has been the motivator that pushes her to work every day.  She sells merchandise.  This has become a great help because she has to earn income because her family is low income.  At the age of 29, Miriam is the mother of 6 children that she wants to provide a better quality of life for.

Miriam is a fighter who, despite having had public order difficulties, has continued moving forward and facing adversity with much tenacity.  She dreams with buying a motorcycle in the future that will ease her work and allow her to have more sales and thus increase her income proportionately.

However, at this moment Miriam is asking for a loan to buy merchandise to have more products to offer her customers thus attaining a position in front of the other vendors in the sector.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Joaquin

texts.es: El Sr. Joaquín  de 27 años,  de estado civil soltero, con una hija, tiene ya 7 años dedicándose al negocio de la gomería. El Sr. Joaquín se vio en la necesidad de solicitar crédito de nuestra institución debido a la necesidad y oportunidad  que posee de comprar una compresora para mejorar su negocio,  ya que el hasta la actualidad trabaja con una prestada y  vieja compresora, es cliente nuevo  de la institución sin deudas en otras instituciones,  cuenta con domicilio conocido ubicado al  sur  de nuestra ciudad, razón por la cual no se le negó dicho crédito, es una persona muy trabajadora con ganas de superación agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Joaquín is 27, single and father of one child.  He has worked for seven years repairing vehicle tires.  He now seeks credit in order to buy a compressor for his business, as up to now he has been using a borrowed one.  Joaquin is a new borrower with no prior debts.  He lives in the southern part of the city where it is difficult for him to obtain credit.  He is hardworking and hopes to prosper and grow his business with the support of this loan.

loans.use: to buy equipment (a compressor)

loans.name: Nicolaza

texts.es: La  Señora Nicolaza tiene 33 años es  madre soltera con 2 hijos menores dependientes , vive con su madre que tiene 61 años en sector de Aguirre ubicado a 42 km de la ciudad de Cochabamba, La sra. Nicolaza se dedica a la agricultura produce papa, haba, oca en su terreno que tiene 1.6 has y 4 cabezas de ganado vacuno, es una persona humilde pero trabajadora,  ella ha solicitado el crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas abono orgánico más semilla de papa, porque el capital que tenía lo ha invertido en la compra de una casa, ahora el lugar donde habita es propio. Para ella es muy difícil acudir a los Bancos de la ciudad que les piden muchos requisitos, por eso se tuvo la iniciativa de ir a esa zona y ofertar crédito, la Sra. Nicolaza está muy contenta de haber que tiene la oportunidad para comprar los insumos agrícolas para siembra, de este modo tendrá la seguridad de sus hijos puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida y también poder ahorrar dinero para hacer estudiar a sus dos hijos.
texts.en: Nicolaza is 33 and a single mother of two children.  She lives with her mother, who is 61, in the town of  Aguirre, some 42 km outside of the city of Cochabamba. Nicolaza grows agricultural crops such as potatoes and beans on her farm of 1.6 hectares.  She cares for 4 cows, and is a very hardworking woman.  She seeks this credit to buy organic fertilizer to increase her potato crop yield.  She used a prior loan to pay for her own house. She does not have access to credit in large banks, and is very happy to be able to participate in microcredit and improve her family's situation, allowing her two children the opportunity to study.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer and crop seed

loans.name: Walter Jose

texts.es: Walter de 29 años de edad es soltero, labora para Alcaldia de Juigalpa como obrero desde hace 11 años. Esta solicitando su 4to credito con el objetivo de comprar materiales para construir un pequeño cuarto en casa de sus padres.   Su mayor sueño es podertener su propia vivienda para cuando tenga su familia  brindarle mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Walter is 29 years old and single. He has been  a worker in the city hall in Juigalpa for 11 years. He is asking for his 4th loan to purchase materials to build a small room in his parents' house. His biggest dream is to own his own home for when he has a family so that he can provide them with a good quality of life.

loans.use: to build a room.

loans.name: Riziki

texts.en:
Riziki is a married woman with five children, four of whom attend school. She owns a house that has no electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

For the past 5 years, Riziki has operated a beauty salon business from home, catering to her neighbors and passersby. She also operates a food stall business as another source of income. Riziki faces a major challenge of seasonality. During the low season, especially from April through July, the availability of customers is lower. Riziki dreams of expanding her business in the future.

Riziki plans to use this KES 20,000 loan to purchase hair weaves, gel and hair food oil. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: To purchase hair weaves, gel and hair food oil.

loans.name: Leonardo

texts.es:
El señor Leonardo es conviviente con la señora Alberta más de 18 años, tienen 8 hijos dependientes que estudian de diferentes edades, familia muy humilde viven en Colomi calle 13 de noviembre entre Cochabamba zona sud hace 2 años atrás.                                                                                                    

El señor Leonardo es transportista y agricultor, nos dice que anteriormente en la producción agrícola le fue muy mal por esa razón el compro un vehículo sacando un préstamo de un Banco para trabajar con pasajeros de Colomi hacia Cochabamba y viceversa, pero sigue cultivando papa, haba, oca por lo cual ellos se apersonaron a solicitar un crédito porque necesitan dinero para comprar abono orgánico (gallinaza), semilla de papa.

El Señor Leonardo y su esposa se sienten felices por haber tenido esta oportunidad, que ahora ellos quieren volver a sembrar en más superficies teniendo mejores ingresos económicos con las dos actividades que realiza transporte y producción agrícola y asi brindarles una mejor calidad de vida a sus 8 hijos tanto en el estudio como para una vida mejor hacia el futuro.
texts.en: Leonardo has been married to his wife Alberta for 18 years, and they have 8 children.  They reside in Colomi, Cochabamba, Bolivia.                                Leonardo is a driver and farmer.  In years past, harvests were meager so he obtained a loan to buy a vehicle to transport passengers between Colomi and Cochabamba.  Aside from driving, he continues to grow potatoes and beans and seeks this credit in order to obtain fertilizer and crop seed.  With this assistance, Leonardo plans to expand the amount of land under cultivation and better provide for his 8 children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seed to grow potatoes

loans.name: Orlando Antonio

texts.es: Orlando de 49 años de edad es soltero, labora para Alcaldia de Juigalpa como responsable de sanidad publica desde hace 5años. Esta solicitando su 2do credito con el objetivo de mejorar su vivienda, cambiando el techo que se encuentra en mal estado y construir un sumidero.Sueña con poder brindarle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Orlando is 49 years old and single. He has been working for the Juigalpa municipality as a public health manager for 5 years. He is asking for his 2nd loan with the goal to improve his home. He will replace his roof because it is in bad shape and he will build a drainage system. His dream is to provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to replace his roof.

loans.name: Halima

texts.en:
Halima is a married woman with one child who is too young for school. She owns a house that has no electricity nor piped water. 

For the past year, Halima has operated a business selling mahamri (dumplings) at the market to her neighbors and villagers. She also operates a hairdressing business as another source of livelihood. Halima faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. During the rainy season it becomes difficult for customers to come to the market. She dreams of expanding her business in the future.

Halima plans to use this KES 10,000 loan to purchase bundles of wheat flour and cooking oil. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: To purchase wheat flour and cooking oil.

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma is a married woman with 3 children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has no electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees. For the past 5 months, Fatuma has operated a firewood sales business, selling from home to her neighbors and passersby. She also sells farm products as another source of income. Fatuma faces a major challenge of seasonality. During the rainy season, the availability of firewood for supply is low compared to the high demand for it.

Fatuma plans to use this KES 20,000 loan to purchase bundles of firewood for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: To purchase bundles of firewood for resale.

loans.name: Josefa Del Socorro

texts.es: Josefa de 43 años de edad es casada, labora para la Escuela Enrique Tierno Galvan como directora docente desde hace 25 años. Esta solicitando su 8vo credito con el objetivo de mejorar su vivienda construyendo un cuarto para mejor comodidad de su familia. Doña Josefa expresa que todos sus creditos los ha utilizado para mejorar poco a poco su casita, y  con el credito anterior puso la ceramica a la sala. Su mayor sueño es poder brindarle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Josefa is 43 years old and married.  She has worked as the principal of the Enrique Tierno Galvan School for 25 years. 

She is requesting her eighth loan in order to improve her house. The loan is to build a room in order to make her family more comfortable.  Josefa says that she has used all of the loans to improve her house, little by little.  With the previous loan she put down a ceramic floor in the living room.

Her biggest dream is to be able to give her family better living conditions.

loans.use: to build a room.

loans.name: Efrain

texts.es:
El Señor Efrain, es una persona de 26 años de edad de estado civil soltero, pero vive en concubinato, es bachiller en humanidades, vive en casa de sus padres junto a su esposa y sus 2 hijos los cuales son sus dependientes económicos, la actividad principal a la que se dedica es la agricultura, producen anualmente papa, oca y haba en los terrenos agrícolas heredados de sus padres que se hallan situadas en la comunidad de C'aspi Cancha del municipio de Tíraque distante aproximadamente a unos 75 Km. de la ciudad de Cochabamba. 
   
En la actividad agrícola intervienen el cliente y su esposa los cuales manifiestan tener ganas de superarse económicamente para tal efecto se ven en la necesidad de solicitar capital de inversión para la compra de abono de gallinaza y semilla de papa certificada y de esta forma poder incrementar su producción en especial de la papa y atravez de ello obtener mayores ingresos económicos mejorando de esta manera las condiciones de vida de la familia.
texts.en:
Efrain is 26 years old and single.  However, he lives with his common-law wife.  He has a degree in humanities.  He lives in his parents’ house with his wife and their two children.  The children are economically dependent upon him.

His main business activity is farming.  He produces potatoes, “oca” (a small starchy tuber from the Andean highlands), and beans on the farmland that he inherited from his parents.  They are in the C'aspi Cancha community in the Tíraque municipality.  It is approximately 75 kilometers from the city of Cochabamba.

Both the loan customer and his wife are involved in the farm activity and are intent on improving their economic situation.  In order to do so they see the need to request money to buy chicken manure and certified seed potatoes.  That is the way he will be able to increase his production, especially potato production.  Through this business activity he will get greater income, and he will be improving his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer and seeds.

loans.name: Hadija

texts.en:
Hadija is a married woman with eight children, two of whom attend school. She owns a house that has no electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past 15 years, Hadija has operated a business selling fish from home to neighbors and passersby. Her major challenge is seasonality. During the hot, dry season, it becomes difficult to get supplies of fish for sale. Hadija dreams of expanding and establishing a retail shop in the future.

Hadija plans to use this KES 20,000 loan to purchase 4 sacks of fish for sale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: To purchase fish for resale.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es: Alicia de 44 años de edad es soltera, labora para el Hospital Asuncion como enfermera desde hace 19 años. Esta solicitando su 9no credito con el objetivo de mejorar su vivienda, y espera seguir contando con el apoyo de kiva, esta vez para compra de cemento y hierro para hacer una plancha que servira como base para construir un cuarto en la planta alta de su casa y asi brindar mayor comodidad a su familia.  Alicia expresa sentirse agradecida con AFODENIC pues todos los creditos los ha utilizado para mejorar su casa.
texts.en:
Alicia is 44 years old and single.  She has worked as a nurse for the Asuncion Hospital for 19 years.

She is requesting her ninth loan in order to improve her home.  She hopes to continue counting of Kiva’s support.  This time she will use the loan to buy cement and iron to make a slab, which will serve as a base in order to build a room on the top floor of her house.  This way she will make her family more comfortable.

Alicia says that she is grateful to AFODENIC.  She has used all of the loans to improve her house.

loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Nyambwana

texts.en:
Nyambwana is a married woman with four children, all of whom attend school. She lives in her own house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

For the past 4 years, Nyambwana has operated a grocery business, selling at the market to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. Nyambwana dreams of expanding her business in the future.

Nyambwana plans to use this KES 40,000 loan to purchase sacks of onions and potatoes for sale. She decided to work with Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: To purchase sacks of onions and potatoes for sale.

loans.name: Miriam Rosa

texts.es: Miriam Rosa de 41 años de edad es soltera, tiene 3 hijos: la mayor esta estudiando en Cuba becada, Silvio de 18 años trabaja y apoya a su mamá y la menor de 12 años estudia 1er año de secundaria. Miriam trabaja para el INACH desde hace 21 años, desempeñandose como docente de secundaria. Esta solicitando su 8vo credito con el objetivo de continuar mejorando su vivienda repellando 3 cuartos y la cocina  ya que con el credito anterior logro dar mas seguridad a su casa poniendo las verjas de las puertas.
texts.en: Miriam Rosa, 41, is single and has 3 children.  Her oldest is studying in Cuba on a scholarship.  Silvio, 18, works and supports his mother, and the youngest is 12 and is in the first year of middle school.  Miriam has worked for INACH for 21 years teaching secondary school.  She is requesting her 8th loan, with the goal of continuing to make improvements to her home.  With this loan she will plaster 3 rooms and the kitchen; with the previous loan she was able to make her home more secure by putting iron grates on the doors.

loans.use: to plaster rooms in her house

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice is a single woman who owns a house that has electricity but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food. 

Alice operates a grocery business, selling at the market to her neighbors and passersby. She also operates a boutique business as a second source of income. Alice dreams of expanding and accessing more funds in the future. 

Alice plans to use this KES 40,000 loan to purchase bundles of green vegetables, tomatoes and potatoes for her grocery business. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: To purchase green vegetables, tomatoes and potatoes

loans.name: Cesar Augusto

texts.es: Cesar Augusto de 38 años de edad es casado, tiene 2 niños en edad escolar labora para la Alcaldia de Juigalpa como colector de ingresos desde hace 12 años. Esta solicitando su 3er credito para seguir mejorando su casa de habitacion, esta vez construyendo un cuarto anexo, pues con el credito anterior lo utilizo para hacer su porche.  Espera poder seguir contando con el apoyo de KIVA y AFODENIC para continuar mejorado su casa y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Cesar Augusto, 38, is married and has 2 school-aged children.  He has worked for the municipality of Juigalpa as a tax collector for 12 years.  He is requesting his 3rd loan to continue to make improvements to his home.  With his previous loan he added a porch, and with this loan he plans to add a room to his house.  He hopes to continue to rely on the support of Kiva and Afodenic, so that he can continue to make improvements to his home and thereby improve the living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to build a room

loans.name: Petrona Isabel

texts.es: Petrona Isabel de 36 aaños de edad es casada, tiene 2 niños: el mayor cursando la primaria y el menor en preescolar. Petrona es vendedora de productos cosmeticos Vogue desde hace varios años, cuenta con el apoyo de su marido quien asume los gastos del hogar. Esta solicitando su 3er credito para continuar la construccion de su casa, poniendole el piso, pintarla y otros detalles que no logro hacer con el credito anterior. Petrona sueña con ver construida su casa,ya que es el patrimonio que sus padres le estan dando y en el futuro piensa mejorarla para que sus hijos tengan mayor comodidad.
texts.en: Petrona Isabel, 36, is married and has 2 children.  The oldest is in elementary school, and the younger one is in preschool.  Petrona has been selling Vogue cosmetic products for a number of years.  She relies on the support of her husband, who pays the household expenses.  She is requesting her third loan to continue with some work on her house: putting in a floor, painting, and other finishing work that she was not able to finance with her previous loan.  Petrona dreams of seeing all of the improvements to her house finished, since the house is an inheritance from her parents and she has plans to improve it so that her children will be able to live in greater comfort.

loans.use: to put in a new floor in her house

loans.name: Jose Manuel

texts.es:
José Manuel tiene 39 años, es viudo vive con los  cinco hijos. Vive en El Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Esta Ventanilla se llama NARCISA DE JESUS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Temistocles, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

José se dedica a la agricultura en especial a la siembra de maíz, es tradición en su familia dedicarse a este negocio. Las comprar las realiza en Ventanas cada mes y las vende en la feria de la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos y la variación del clima. Su sueño es comprar terrenos para seguir sembrando.

Le gusta mucho trabajar en el campo.
texts.en:
Jose Manuel is 39 and is a widower with 5 children.  He lives in the canton of Ventanas in the Los Rios province.

His communal bank is called "Narcisa de Jesus," and is located in the rural San Temistocles settlement in Ventanas canton.  The members of this  communal bank work in short-cycle agriculture growing corn and rice.

Jose is a farmer who specializes in growing corn, which is a family tradition.  He makes his purchases every month in the canton of Ventanas, and he sells his products in the market in the same locality.

He is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure.  The financial support of this loan will help him to purchase the supplies that he needs.  He confronts the challenges of pests, diseases and variations in the weather that affect his crops.  His dream is to buy land so that he can continue to farm.

He really enjoys working in the countryside.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce is a married woman with two children, one of whom attends school. She lives in a rental house that has electricity but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

For the past 10 years, Joyce has operated a retail shop business, selling to her neighbors and passersby. Joyce faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. She dreams of expanding and selling at wholesale in the future.

Joyce plans to use this KES 20,000 loan to purchase 10 bundles of wheat flour and 2 sacks of sugar for sale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: To purchase wheat flour and sugar for sale.

loans.name: Heroes De Arica Group

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Héroes D. Arica, empieza su ciclo 7 con 13 socias, las cuales tiene diferentes negocios como L. venta D. golosinas, venta D. ropa, centrales D. llamadas telefónicas, realizan servicio D. transporte en mototaxi, otras son feriantes, realizan tejidos a mano, y venden comida.
L. Presidenta para éste ciclo es Angélica, tiene 31 años, es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos D. (7 y 2años), se dedica a L. venta D. frutas por L. calles D. L. ciudad. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en L. compra D. un triciclo para llevar sus productos. Esta en FINCA Perú, hace tres años ingresó por L. invitación D. su cuñada. Estaba ahorrando pero su esposo se enfermó y utilizó sus ahorros para L. salud D. su esposo. Su sueño es poder ahorrar para comprarse un terreno.
texts.en: The communal bank "Héroes D. Arica" is starting its 7th loan cycle with 13 members, who have a variety of businesses including: candy sales, clothing sales, telephone call centers, mototaxi transportation services and food sales.  Other members make knitted products and sell products from stalls in the local markets. The president for this cycle is Angelica.  She is 31 years old, lives with a partner and has 2 children aged 7 and 2.  Angelica has a business selling fruit on the streets of the city.  She will invest the proceeds of this loan to buy a 3 wheeled bike with attached cart to transport her products.  She has been a member of FINCA Peru for 3 years; she joined at the invitation of her sister-in-law.  She was saving money, but her husband got sick and she had to use her savings for his medical bills.  Her dream is to be able to save to buy a plot of land.

loans.use: to buy a 3 wheeled bike with attached cart

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
Carlos  tiene 56 años, es casado vive con la esposa y un hijo de 8 años que se llama Carlos. Vive en El Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Esta Ventanilla se llama NARCISA DE JESUS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Temistocles, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Carlos  se dedica a la agricultura en especial a la siembra de maíz y arroz, por mas de 25 años. Las comprar las realiza en Ventanas cada mes y las vende en la feria de la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos y la variación del clima. Su sueño es seguir adelante a poayar a la familia.

Le gusta trabajar en la agricultura.
texts.en:
Carlos is 56 years old.  He is married and lives with his wife and 8 year-old son named Carlos.  He lives in the canton of Ventanas in Los Rios province.  

His communal bank is called "Narciso de Jesus" and is located in the rural San Temistocles settlement in the canton of Ventanas.  The members of this communal bank work in short cycle agriculture cultivating corn and rice.

Carlos has been farming corn and rice for more than 25 years.  He makes his purchases in Ventanas every month, and sells his crops in the market in the same locality.

He requests a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure.  The support of this loan will help him financially to be able to buy the supplies he needs.  As a farmer, he encounters challenges such as pests, diseases and weather conditions that affect his crops.  His dream is to continue to get ahead so that he can support his family.

He enjoys working in agriculture.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure

loans.name: Ligia Antonia

texts.es: Ligia de 27 años es soltera, trabaja como responsable de cartera y cobro desde hace 2½ años, ademas se dedica a la venta de joyas de plata y oro laminado para obtener ingresos adicionales para asi brindarle apoyo a su mamá, pues actualmente no tiene familia propia. Esta solicitando su 3er credito con el objetivo de invertir en su pequeño negocio comprando prendas para poder ofrecer mas a sus clientes y satisfacer sus demandas.  Sueña en el futuro poder tener su propio negocio que le permita brindarle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Ligia, 27 years old and single, has worked as an account manager for two and a half years. In addition to this, she sells gold and silver-plated jewelry to earn extra income and support her mother because right now she does not have her own family. She is requesting her third loan to invest in her small business, buying items so she will be able to offer more to her customers and satisfy their demands. Her dream for the future is to have her own business that will allow her to giver her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase jewelry pieces to sell to her customers

loans.name: Cesar Adolfo

texts.es:
Cesar Adolfo tiene 22 años, es soltero vive con los padres. Vive en El Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Esta Ventanilla se llama NARCISA DE JESUS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Temistocles, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Cesar se dedica a la agricultura en especial a la siembra de maíz, es tradición en su familia dedicarse a este negocio. Las comprar las realiza en Ventanas cada mes y las vende en la feria de la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos y la variación del clima. Su sueño es comprar una casa.

Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Cesar Adolfo is 22 years old; he is single and lives with his parents. He lives in the Canton Ventanas Province of Los Rios.

This group is called Narcisa de Jesus; it is located in the San Temistocles Building in the Canton Ventanas zone. This group pertains to agricultural work for the short planting season for corn and rice.

Cesar works in agriculture, especially in planting corn. It is a family tradition to work in this business. He purchases the seeds locally each month and sells [the produce] in the local market.

He is requesting this loan to purchase seeds and fertilizers. This loan will help him financially to provide for his needs in the face of challenges such as plagues, crop diseases, and climate changes. He dream is to purchase a house.

He likes to play sports.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Aura Lyla

texts.es: Aura Lyla de 52 años de edad es soltera, trabaja como vendedora de productos AVON desde hace 5 años, ademas junto a su hermana tienen un negocio de cafetin donde venden comida corriente para alumnos de la universidad. Esta solicitando  su 3er credito con el objetivo de invertir en el cafetin con productos varios y ademas ponerle el zinc ya que se acerca el invierno y no quiere que sus clientes dejen de comprarle por no contar con las condiciones necesarias.  Sueña con ver su negocio mas amplio y bonito para que sus clientes se sientan comodos.
texts.en:
Aura Lyla, 52 years old, is single. She has been working as an Avon representative for five years. She and her sister also have a small cafe where they sell fast food to university students. She is requesting her third loan to invest in the cafe, purchasing a variety of items. She also wants to install a metal roof since winter is coming, and she does not want her customers to leave without buying anything because of bad conditions.

She dreams of seeing her business become bigger and better so her customers can be more comfortable.

loans.use: to purchase items for her cafe and a metal roof

loans.name: Oscar Ernesto

texts.es:
Oscar Ernesto tiene 20 años, es casado vive con la esposa y con los padres. Vive en El Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Esta Ventanilla se llama NARCISA DE JESUS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Temistocles, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Osacar se dedica a la agricultura en especial a la siembra de maíz, es tradición en su familia dedicarse a este negocio. Las comprar las realiza en Ventanas cada mes y las vende en la feria de la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos y la variación del clima. Su sueño es comprar una casa en la ciudad de ventanas.

Le gusta trabajar y conversar con la esposa.
texts.en:
Oscar Ernesto is 20 years old. He is married and lives with his wife and parents. He lives in the Canton Ventanas Province of Los Rios.

This group is called Narcisa de Jesus. It is located in the San Temistocles Building in the Canton Ventanas zone. This group pertains to agricultural work within the short planting seasons for corn and rice.

Oscar works in agriculture, especially in the planting of corn. It is a family tradition to work in this business. He purchases the seeds locally each month and sells [the produce] in the local market.

He is requesting this loan to purchase seeds and fertilizers. This loan will help him financially to meet his needs in the face of challenges such as plagues, crop diseases, and climate changes. His dream is to purchase a house in the city of Ventanas.

He likes to work and talk to his wife.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es:
La sr. Lidia vive por la zona de Tamborada, cuenta con su ganado vacuno propio, y se encarga de producir de forma diaria leche cruda y este su producto lo entrega a un tanque de enfriamiento que hay en la zona para luego la empresa de la Planta Industrializadora de leche se encarga de su recojo dos veces al dia a las 8 de la mañana y a las 7 de la tarde.

La señora Lidia se ha dedicado desde siempre a la cria de vacas, con este negocio ha podido dar una educacion a sus hijos, ha podido generar mejores ingresos dia a dia.
Pero aun debe seguir trabajando porque desea mejorar un poco las condiciones de vida ya que su casa esta construida con adobes de barro.

La sr. Lidia vio la oportunidad de comprar forraje de vendedores ambulantes, de ese modo solicito un credito para poder comprar el forraje para su ganado, aprovechando el precio al quele venderan, asi podra ahorar en la alimentacin de sus vacas y tambien las vacas podran producir mas leche.
texts.en:
Lidia lives in the Tamborada zone. She has her own cattle, and she daily produces raw milk which she sends to a refrigerated tank that is in the area. Later, the industrial plant picks up the milk twice a day - at 8 am and 7 pm.

Lidia has always raised cattle. Through this business, she has been able to giver her children an education, and she has been able to generate better revenue day by day. Now, she still has to work because she wants to improve her quality of life a little bit since her house is made of adobe bricks.

Lidia saw the opportunity to purchase some feed from traveling salesmen, so she is requesting a loan to purchase feed for her cattle and take advantage of the price while the feed is being sold. This way, she will be able to save on feeding her cattle, and the cows will be able to produce more milk.

loans.use: to purchase cattle feed

loans.name: Celia

texts.es:
Celia tiene 26 años, es socia del Banco Comunal Marcela, es madre soltera, tiene 2 hijos, uno de 11 años y otro de 4 años de edad. Celia vende ropa, para damas caballeros y niños. Celia se dedica a la venta de ropa, para damas, caballeros y niños, viaja a la Feria de Santa Rosa.
El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de mercadería.
Celia está en FINCA Perú, hace tres ciclos, le gusta por la facilidad en los préstamos, les enseñan y se practican los valores, se puede ahorrar. Esta ahorrando para comprarse un terreno.
texts.en:
Celia is 26 years old. She is a member of the “Marcela” Communal Bank. She is a single mother and has two children. One child is 11 years old and the other child is four years old. Celia sells women’s, men’s and children’s clothing. Selling women’s, men’s and children’s clothing is her business and she also travels to the Santa Rosa Market.
The requested loan will be used to purchase of merchandise.
Celia has been a part of FINCA Perú for three cycles. She likes the ease of the loans. They learn and practice values and she can save money.  Celia is saving money in order to purchase a plot of land.

loans.use: buy seasonal clothing

loans.name: Walter

texts.es:
Walter, es socio del Banco Comunal Marcela, tiene 32 años, es soltero. Se dedica a la venta de mochilas. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de mercadería.
Walter tiene un puesto de venta de mochilas en le Jr. Grau, ingreso a FINCA Perú, por la invitación de su hermana, con éste es el segundo ciclo que ésta. Le gusta le parece interesante la forma de trabajo. Está ahorrando para tener más capital de trabajo.
texts.en:
Walter is a member of the “Marcela” communal bank.  He’s 32 years old and single.  He sells backpacks.  The loan he’s requesting will be used to buy merchandise.

Walter has a stand selling backpacks in Jr. Grau.   He joined FINCA Perú invited by his sister.  This is his second cycle.  He likes it; he thinks the way it operates is interesting.  He is saving up in order to have more working capital.

loans.use: to buy assorted backpacks.

loans.name: Leibnitz Marcelo

texts.es:
Leibnitz marcelo tiene 36 años, es casado vive con la esposa y con dos hijas de 11 y 4 años. Vive en El Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Esta Ventanilla se llama NARCISA DE JESUS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Temistocles, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Leibnitz se dedica a la agricultura en especial a la siembra de maíz y arroz, es tradición en su familia dedicarse a este negocio. Las comprar las realiza en Ventanas cada mes y las vende en la feria de la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos y la variación del clima. Su sueño es construir la casa ya que en la que vive es muy vieja.

Le gusta salir a pasear con la familia.
texts.en:
Leibnitz Marcelo is 36 years old, married and living with his wife and two daughters who are 11 and 4 years of age.  He lives in Ventanas Canton in Los Ríos Province.

This communal bank is called "Narcisa de Jesús" and is located in San Temístocles which is in Ventanas Canton.  The members are short cycle corn and rice farmers.

Leibnitz is a farmer, especially of corn and rice.  It’s a family tradition to be in this business.  His purchases take place in Ventanas and his sales at the market there.

He is asking for a loan to buy seed, fertilizer and manure.  Support from the loan will help him economically to meet his needs.  The challenges he faces are infestations and crop illnesses as well as weather variations.  His dream is to build a house because the one he lives in is very old.  He enjoys going on family outings.

loans.use: to buy seed, fertilizer and manure.

loans.name: Gloria Cecilia

texts.en:
Sra. Gloria Cecilia is 32 years old. She is single and lives in the city of San Gabriel in the northernmost region of Ecuador. She is a single mother and household head. She lives with her four children who are aged 15, 12, 10, and 4. 

A friendly and responsible person, she is dedicated to the sale and trade of pigs in the street markets of her city. She is seeking a loan to invest in her business by improving the place where her pigs are bred and raised. She began her business to meet the needs of her family with a steady income. She usually works independently but sometimes her children help her in their free time after school. 

Gloria Cecilia enjoys being an entrepreneur because, "I  learn new things every day." With the support of this loan, Gloria Cecilia believes that she can improve her business, increase her family's income, and improve their quality of life. She says it will help her expand her business and allow her to educate her four children.

loans.use: to invest in her pig-raising business by improving the space where the pigs are bred and raised.

loans.name: Luz Maria

texts.es:
Luz Maria tiene 21 años, es casada vive con el esposo y una hija. Vive en El Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Esta Ventanilla se llama NARCISA DE JESUS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Temistocles, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Luz Maria se dedica a la agricultura en especial a la siembra de maíz, es tradición en su familia dedicarse a este negocio. Las comprar las realiza en Ventanas cada mes y las vende en la feria de la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos y la variación del clima. Su sueño es comprar una casa para la familia.

Le gusta salir a pàsear por la ciudad con la familia.
texts.en:
Luz María is 21 years old, married and living with her husband and daughter.  She lives in Ventanas Canton in Los Ríos Province.

This communal bank is called Narcisa de Jesús and is located in San Temístocles which is in Ventanas Canton.  The members are short cycle corn and rice farmers.

Luz María is a farmer, especially of corn.  It’s a family tradition to be in this business.  Her purchases take place in Ventanas and his sales at the market there.

She is asking for a loan to buy seed, fertilizer and manure.  Support from the loan will help her economically to meet her needs.  The challenges she faces are infestations and crop illnesses as well as weather variations.  Her dream is to buy a house for the family.  She enjoys going on family excursions in the city.

loans.use: to buy seed, fertilizer and manure.

loans.name: Maria Donatilda

texts.es: Maria es socia del Banco Comunal Obelisco, tiene 44 años, es casada. Se dedica a la venta de alfalfa, frutas, verduras. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de frutas y verduras para surtir su mercadería. Maria tiene un puesto de venta de verduras alfalfa y verduras en el mercado de Quinua. Ella sale todos los días muy temprano(4:00 a.m) al mercado Nery García Zarate donde hace sus compras de ahí se va  directo al paradero y toma su carro a Quinua donde tiene su puesto, realiza este trabajo hace 10 años. Está en FINCA Perú, hace tres años una Promotora de FINCA Perú fue a Quinua y le invitó a formar su Banco Comunal. Le gusta por la facilidad en los préstamos y le enseñan a ahorrar, con sus ahorros pudo incrementar su negocio. Su sueño es que su negocio siga creciendo.
texts.en:
María is a member of the “Obelisco” (Obelisk) communal bank.  She is 44 years old and married.  She sells alfalfa, fruit and vegetables.  The loan she’s requesting will be used to buy fruit and vegetables to stock up on merchandise.

María has a vegetable, alfalfa and fruit stand in the Quinua market.  She goes out early (4am) every day to the Nery García Zarate market to do her purchases and from there heads directly to the bus stop to take a ride to her stand in Quinua.  She’s been doing this work for 10 years.

She’s been in FINCA Perú for three years.  One of the FINCA Perú promoters came to Quinua and invited her to form her communal bank.  She likes it because of the ease of loans and because they teach her how to save.  She was able to enlarge her business with her savings.  Her dream is that the business continues to grow.

loans.use: to buy fruit.

loans.name: Maria Mercedes

texts.es:
Maria Mercedes tiene 33 años, es casada vive con el esposo y con los cuatro hijos. Vive en El Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Esta Ventanilla se llama NARCISA DE JESUS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Temistocles, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Maria se dedica a la agricultura en especial a la siembra de maíz, port mas de 12 años. Las comprar las realiza en Ventanas cada mes y las vende en la feria de la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos y la variación del clima. Su sueño es comprar una finca.

Le gusta cocinar lavar y planchar
texts.en:
María Mercedes is 33 years old, married and living with her husband and four children in Ventanas Canton in Los Ríos Province.

This communal bank is called “Narcisa de Jesús” and is located in San Temístocles which is part of Ventanas Canton.  The members of this communal bank are short cycle corn and rice farmers.

María is a farmer, especially of corn.  She’s been farming for over 12 years.  She does her purchases in Ventanas every month and her sales take place at the market there.

She is asking for the loan to buy seed, fertilizer and manure.  Support from the loan will help her economically to meet her needs.  The challenges she faces are infestations and illnesses in the crops and variations in the weather.  Her dream is to buy a farm.  She enjoys cooking, doing laundry and ironing.

loans.use: to buy seed, fertilizer and manure.

loans.name: G.s. Estrella De Dios Group

texts.es: Sonia del Carmen, Juana, Dora y Graciela conforman el grupo solidario Estrella De Dios. Graciela tiene 9 años de trabajar en la venta de tortillas, inicio este medio de vida como una alternativa de apoyo para su esposo ya que no tenían los suficientes ingresos para mantener a sus 5 hijos menores de edad a su cargo de 3, 5, 7, 9 y 12 años a pesar de ser una familia con muy pocos ingresos han podido enseñarles a sus hijos valores y ganarse la vida de una manera muy honrada. El motivo del crédito que realiza es para la compra de cal, maíz, leña, bolsas plásticas, actualmente el precio del quintal de maíz es muy caro y ella quiere comprarlo a gran cantidad.
texts.en: Sonia del Carmen, Juana, Dora and Graciela make up the supportive group "Estrella De Dios" (Star of god).  Graciela has been selling tortillas for 9 years.  She started this means of earning a living as another support for her husband, since they didn't have sufficient income to support their 5 dependent children ages 3, 5, 7, 9 and 12.  In spite of being a very low income family, they have been able to teach their children good values and to earn an honest living.  The purpose of the current loan is to purchase lime, corn, firewood and plastic bags.  Currently, the price for 100 kg. of corn is very high, and Graciela wants to buy it in a greater quantity.

loans.use: to purchase lime, corn, firewood and plastic bags.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es: Yolanda es socia del Banco Comunal Obelisco, tiene 39 años, es conviviente con dos hijos de 17 y 14 años de edad. Se dedica a la venta de artesanías. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de mercaderías como: chompas, chullos, piedras de Huamanga. Yolanda tiene un puesto de Artesanía en el Paradero Quinua – Ayacucho, su esposo es artesano hace trabajos a base de arcilla y los surte con otros productos. Tiene éste negocio hace 12 años. Ingreso a FINCA Perú, por la invitación de una promotora, le gusta por la facilidad en los préstamos y se puede ahorrar con sus ahorros fue implementando poco a poco su casa compró: televisor, DVD, equipo de sonido, mesas, etc. Ahora está ahorrando para celebrar el 15 años de su hija. Su sueño es mejorar su casa y que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Yolanda is a member of the Obelisco community bank.  She is 39 years old, lives with her partner, and has two children aged 17 and 14.  Her business is selling handicrafts.

Yolanda will invest the loan that she is requesting in buying merchandise such as sweaters, 'chullos' (woollen caps with earflaps) and alabaster.  Yolanda has a craft stall in Paradero Quinua - Ayacucho.  Her husband is a craftsman who makes products from clay and supplies them with other products.

Yolanda has been in this business for 12 years.  She joined FINCA Peru through an invitation from a promoter.  She likes it because of the ease of the loans and because she can save.  Through her savings, she has gradually equipped her home.  She has bought a television set, a DVD player, a sound system, tables, etc.  She is now saving up to celebrate her daughter's 15th birthday.  Her dreams are to improve her home and for her children to become professionals.

loans.use: to buy sweaters, 'chullos' (woollen caps with earflaps) and alabaster

loans.name: Santos Efrain

texts.es: Santos Efrain de 44 años es soltero, trabaja para el MINED como maestro de Educacion Fisico desde hace 24 años en 2 centrso de enseñanza secundaria, en el San Francisco en Nuestra Señora de la Asuncion. Tiene una hija estudiando la universidad. Esta solicitando su 5to credito con el objetivo de reparar el piso de su casa ya que con el credito anterior no logro hacerlo porque le dejaron mal el trabajo, pues el embaldozado que le hicieron se partio ya que su casa esta construida en mal terreno y consulto con otro albañil y le dijo que debian hacer otro tipo de trabajo. Sueña con poder brindarle a su hija las condiciones basicas en su casa ya que es el patrimonio que le dejara.
texts.en:
Santos Efraín, 44, is single.  He has worked for the Ministry of Education as a Physical Education Teacher for the last 24 years at two secondary schools: San Francisco and Nuestra Señora de la Asunción.  He has a daughter studying at the university.

He is asking for his fifth loan to repair the floor in his house because the previous loan didn’t suffice because the job wasn’t done properly; the tiled floor they built cracked because his house is built on uneven terrain.  He consulted with a different bricklayer and was told that a different type of installation had to be done.  He dreams with being able to provide his daughter with basic living conditions at home since this is the patrimony he’ll leave her.

loans.use: to repair the floor.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to increase the inventory of his drugstore.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Santa Rosa De Lima De Conchacalla Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SANTA ROSA D. LIMA D. CONCHACALLA”; La socia vive en el distrito D. Conchacalla la provincia D. Anta,  departamento del Cusco.

La  socia  Margarita; tiene 63 años D. edad y La socia es casada y tiene 6 hijos D. los cuales todos ellos son independientes; la socia se dedica a la agricultura la socia tiene un terreno en el cual cultiva maíz, papa, la socia también cría vacas y toros aparte D. otros animales menores como cuyes, pollos, la socia desea ahora poder comprar una vaca y ovejas para luego vender; la socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra D. una vaca y D. ovejas. 

Los otros socios se dedican a la compra y venta D. productos agrícolas, otros a la ganadería y una D. las socias tiene su tienda D. abarrotes, venta D. chicha, crianza D. animales menores.

La socia valora y agradece infinitamente el crédito otorgado ya que este le permite crecer con su negocio y mejorar su calidad D. vida, así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
Margarita, 63, is a member of the “Santa Rosa D. Lima D. Conchacalla” communal bank.  She lives in Conchacalla District in Anta Province, Cusco Department.

She is married and has six children, all independent.  She is a farmer.  She has a plot of land where she farms corn and potatoes.  She also raises cows and bulls asiD. from other minor animals like guinea pigs and chickens.  She now wants to buy a cow and sheep to sell later on.  She is asking for the loan to buy a cow and sheep.

The other members buy and sell farm products, some raise livestock; one of the members has a grocery store, another sells chicha (drink maD. from corn) and another raises small farm animals.

She values and is infinitely grateful for the granted loan because it allows her to grow in business and improve her quality of life.  At the same time, she commits to pay her installments according to the stipulated time frame.

loans.use: to buy a cow and sheep.

loans.name: Elsa Mariana

texts.es:
Elsa Mariana tiene 21 años, es casada vive con el esposo y con los dos hijos. Vive en El Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Esta Ventanilla se llama NARCISA DE JESUS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Temistocles, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Elsa se dedica a la agricultura en especial a la siembra de maíz y arroz, es tradición en su familia dedicarse a este negocio. Las comprar las realiza en Ventanas cada mes y las vende en la feria de la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos y la variación del clima. Su sueño es comprar tierras.

Le gusta salir con la familia.
texts.en:
Elsa Mariana is 21 years old, married and living with her husband and two children in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.

This communal bank is called “Narcisa de Jesús” and is located in San Temístocles which belongs to Ventanas Canton.  The members of this communal bank are short cycle corn and rice farmers.

Elsa is a farmer, especially of corn and rice.  It’s a family tradition to be in this line of work.  She does her purchases in Ventanas every month and her sales take place in the market there.

She is asking for the loan to buy seed, fertilizer and manure.  Support from the loan will help her economically to meet her needs.  The challenges she faces are crop infestations and illnesses and variations in the weather.  Her dream is to buy land.  She enjoys going out with the family.

loans.use: to buy seed, fertilizer and manure.

loans.name: Susana Marlene

texts.es:
Susana Marlene tiene 25 años, es casada vive con el esposo y con los dos hijos. Vive en El Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Esta Ventanilla se llama NARCISA DE JESUS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Temistocles, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Susana se dedica a la agricultura en especial a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Las comprar las realiza en Ventanas cada mes y las vende en la feria de la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos y la variación del clima. Su sueño es sembrar arboles para proteger el medio ambiente.

Le gusta hacer deporte con los hijos.
texts.en:
Susana Marlene is 25 years old, married and living with her husband and two children in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.

This communal bank is called “Narcisa de Jesús” and is located in San Temístocles which belongs to Ventanas Canton.  The members of this communal bank are short cycle corn and rice farmers.

Susana is a farmer, especially of corn and rice. She does her purchases in Ventanas every month and her sales take place in the market there.

She is asking for the loan to buy seed, fertilizer and manure.  Support from the loan will help her economically to meet her needs.  The challenges she faces are crop infestations and illnesses and variations in the weather.  Her dream is to plant trees to protect the environment.  She enjoys playing sports with her children.

loans.use: to buy seed, fertilizer and manure.

loans.name: Maura Valentina

texts.es:
"La Sra. Maura, tiene como actividad el servicio urbano de pasajeros en su movilidad (minibús), esta actividad la desarrolla conjuntamente con su esposo el Sr. Rudy, quien es el que conduce el mencionado vehicula y la Sra. es quien cobra los pasajes.
El destino del presente crédito es para la reparación del motor de su vehículo esta actividad es la principal fuente de ingreso para su familia que se complementa con sus dos hijos quienes están en edad escolar, es una familia muy trabajadora y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, para mejorar su calidad de vida."
texts.en:
Maura’s activity is providing urban passenger transportation service in her minibus.  She carries out this work with her husband, Rudy, who is the vehicle driver.  Maura collects the fares.

The loan will be used to repair the vehicle’s engine.  This activity is the family’s principal source of income.  The family consists of her two children who are school aged.  It is a very hard working family with a strong desire to get ahead to improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to repair her minibus.

loans.name: Lucia Del Carmen

texts.es: Lucia Del Carmen tiene 49 años, su actividad es la compra y venta de calzado. Tiene más de 2 años en este negocio, Lucia es profesora de primaria con mucho sacrificio inicio este negocio, ya que el salario que obtiene es muy bajo y necesita generar ingresos para su familia, lo que resulta muy favorable es que su trabajo es a medo tiempo en lo que ella aprovecha y sale a ofrecer sus diferentes productos. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de zapatillas, zapatos deportivos, sandalias, botas y chinelas playeras.
texts.en: Lucia Del Carmen is 49 years old.  Her activity is footwear retailing.  She’s been in this business for over two years.  Lucia is an elementary school teacher and she started this business with much sacrifice because the salary she earns is very low and she needs to generate income for her family.  What is advantageous for her is that her job is half day so when she gets off work she can go out to sell her various products.  The reason for the loan is to buy slippers, athletic shoes, sandals, boots and flip-flops for the beach.

loans.use: to buy sandals, athletic shoes, slippers, boots and beach flip-flops.

loans.name: Marcelino

texts.es: Marcelino es un padre de familia, tiene dos hijos y vive en compañía de su esposa. Es agricultor y ganadero por 20 años, desde su niñez aprendió todo lo necesario para desempeñar estas actividades que en la actualidad es la base económica en su familia. Diariamente trabaja desde horas de la madrugada en sus cultivos de maíz y concluye su trabajo al anochecer. Su esposa y sus hijos también apoyan este esfuerzo, sobre todo su esposa que se interna incluso días enteros en la estancia para cuidar a sus animales y después de varios meses de cuidados vende sus animales en la feria ganadera de su zona. Todos los meses viven de sus ganancias producto de sus ventas de animales y cosechas que le permite cubrir las necesidades de alimentación, educación, vivienda y vestido, razón por el cual desea incrementar la cantidad de cabezas de reses y ovejas. Es el primer crédito que tiene con MFP aunque su esposa  ha tenido varios prestamos anteriores y él siempre tuvo conocimiento de estos créditos que han beneficiado bastante a su familia, razón por la cual agradece y espera nuevamente de su apoyo para continuar con su trabajo. En esta ocasión el dinero lo invertirá en la compra de sacos de abono orgánico para cuidar sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Marcelino is a father.  He has two children and he lives with his wife.  He’s been a farmer and cattleman for 20 years.  Since childhood he learned everything necessary to carry out these activities which today form the basis for his family economy.  He starts work daily from early dawn on his corn crops and completes work at nightfall.  His wife and children also help in this effort, above all his wife who sometimes spends the entire day in the farm caring for the animals which after several months of care are sold at the local livestock markets.  

They live off their monthly profits from animal and crop sales which permit them to meet nutrition, education, housing and dress needs.  Because of this he wants to increase his cattle and sheep herd sizes.

This is his first loan with MFP although his wife has had several previous loans and he’s always been cognizant of the great benefit they’ve been for his family.  Because of this he is grateful and hopes once again for support to be able to continue with his work.  On this occasion, the loan will be used to buy sacks of organic manure to care for his crops.

loans.use: to buy sacks of organic manure.

loans.name: Jesús Francisco

texts.en:
Jesús Francisco is 29 years old and lives in San Gabriel, located in the northern region of Ecuador. He is single and has two children, aged 8 and 3. 

Jesús Francisco is a responsible and hard-working person. He is dedicated to raising and selling pigs from his home. The loan will be invested in the purchase of more pigs to expand his business. He also wants to improve the space where his pigs live. He began raising pigs with little working capital and began seeking loans through FODEMI two years ago. 

He is happy to have his own business and his own source of income. In the future he would like to own more pigs and be able to provide job opportunities to his family and others looking for work.

loans.use: to purchase more pigs and improve the space where his pigs live.

loans.name: Karina

texts.es:
Karina es socia del Banco Comunal Santa Rita, tiene 26 años es conviviente, y tiene un hijo de 2 años. Se dedica la venta de ropa, el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de mercaderías.
Karina tiene un puesto en el mercado 12 de Abril. Antes trabajaba en una tienda ahí aprendió del negocio junto su capital y comenzó a trabajar por su cuenta, era ambulante, luego alquilo un puesto y ahora ya es de su propiedad. Le gusta las reuniones de su Banco comunal en FINCA Perú, por la facilidad de los préstamos y las capacitaciones que les dan, les enseñan a trabajar su dinero, sobre la familia matrimonio y salud. Su sueño es poder comprarse una máquina de coser y remalladota, su esposo quiere comenzar a confeccionar el mismo las prendas de vestir.
texts.en:
Karina is a member of the Santa Rita communal bank.  She is 26 years old, has a spouse and a two-year-old son.  She sells clothes.  The loan she’s requesting will be used to buy merchandise.

Karina has a stand in the 12 de Abril market.  She used to work at a store and learned the business there.  She saved up capital and started working for herself.  She was a street vendor but later leased a stand which she now owns.

She enjoys the communal bank meetings in FINCA Perú because of the ease of the loans and the training they get.  They are taught to manage their money, about family, marriage and health.  Her dream is to be able to buy a sewing machine and an overlock machine.  Her husband wants to start making the clothes himself.

loans.use: to buy assorted seasonal clothing.

loans.name: Rosmeli

texts.es:
Rosmeli es socia del Banco Comunal Santa Rita, tiene 22 años, es conviviente, tiene una hija de 2 meses. Se dedica a la venta de ropa. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de mercadería. 
Rosmeli tiene un puesto de ropa en el mercado 12 de Abril. Le gusta FINCA Perú, por la facilidad de los créditos y las capacitaciones que reciben pues aprenden mucho y lo pone en práctica en su vida diaria. Tuvo algunas dificultades en el pago por el nacimiento de su hija no había quien se quede en su puesto, pero ya se recupero. Su sueño es que su negocio siga creciendo.
texts.en:
Rosmeli is a member of the Santa Rita communal bank.  She is 22 years old, has a spouse and a two-month-old daughter.  She sells clothes.  The loan she requested will be used to buy merchandise.

Rosmeli has a clothing stand in the 12 de Abril market.  She likes FINCA Perú because of the ease of loans and the training they receive because they learn a lot that they can put into practice in their daily lives.

She had a few payment problems due to the birth of her daughter because there wasn’t anyone to tend to the stand but she’s recovered now.  Her dream is that the business continues to grow.

loans.use: to buy assorted clothes.

loans.name: Franklin Lucio

texts.es:
Lucio tiene 39 años de edad, está casado y tiene un hijo menor. La vida que lleva Lucio es muy tranquila debido a que la comunidad donde vive es una zona pequeña y rural. Esta comunidad pertenece al distrito de Picsi  en Chiclayo.

Lucio es un hombre trabajador y desde hace 5 años se dedica a la elaboración de ladrillos y adobes. Es muy perfeccionista en su trabajo y esto contribuye a que cuente con clientes fijos que se inclinen por sus productos más que por los de la competencia.
 
Lucio le dedica bastante tiempo a su trabajo para obtener ganancias que le permitan mejorar su calidad de vida, la cual se vio  afectada con el “fenómeno del niño”. La vivienda de Lucio sufrió varios daños debido a las lluvias torrenciales ocasionadas por este fenómeno natural y es por ello que solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 2000 nuevos soles que le permitirá arreglar su vivienda.

Lucio planea reconstruir algunas paredes y arreglar el techo de su casa. Él estaría muy agradecido de concedérsele el préstamo pues estos arreglos le son sumamente necesarios.
texts.en:
Lucio is 39 years old, married and has a minor son.  The life Lucio leads is very calm because the community he lives in is a small, rural zone.  This community belongs to Picsi District in Chiclayo.

Lucio is a hard working man who has been manufacturing bricks and adobe blocks for five years.  He is quite the perfectionist in his work and this contributes to his having a regular base of customers who are inclined to his products over those of the competition.

Lucio puts a lot of time into his work to obtain profits that will allow him to improve his quality of life which was affected by the phenomenon of “El Niño.”  Lucio’s dwelling suffered much damage due to the torrential rains caused by this natural phenomenon and this is why he’s asking Edpyme Alternativa for a 2000 new sol loan to repair his house.

Lucio plans to rebuild some of the walls and to repair the roof.  He would be very grateful if the loan were granted because these repairs are extremely necessary.

loans.use: to do some home improvements.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a bull.

loans.name: Maritza Elizabet

texts.es:
Maritza es una clienta D.  45 años D. edad, casada y  vive en casa alquilada, ubicada en una D. las comunidades rurales pertenecientes al distrito D. TambogranD. en Piura.  

Maritza es una mujer alegre y trabajadora que se dedica a la venta D. abarrotes (avena, arroz, azúcar, leche, café, etc.) y bebidas, en una pequeña bodega instalada en su propio hogar. Además, cuenta con otro ingreso debido a su labor en la costura y confección D. ropa. Posee un buen número D. clientes y cuenta con buenas referencias personales. 

Maritza solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 500 nuevos soles que destinará en la compra D. mercadería (abarrotes) para su negocio. Ella desea otorgarles a sus clientes una mayor variedad D. productos para mantenerlos  contentos y continuar con el próspero desarrollo D. su trabajo.
Las ganancias obtenidas le permitirán  hacer mejoras en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Maritza is a 45 year-old client who is married and lives in a rented house which is located in one of the rural communities of TambogranD. district, in Piura.

Maritza is a cheerful and hard-working woman who sells groceries (oats, rice, sugar, milk, coffee, etc.) and drinks from a small grocery store in her home.  She also has another income from sewing and dressmaking work that she carries out.  She has a good number of customers and has good personal references.

Maritza is requesting a loan for 500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa which she will use to buy merchandise (groceries) for her business.  She would like to proviD. her customers with a wider range of products so that she can keep them happy and continue prosperously developing her business.  The profits she makes will allow her to make some improvements to her home.

loans.use: to buy groceries for her business

loans.name: Blanca Nubia

texts.es:
Blanca Nubia Cortez Céspedes siempre se ha considerado una guerrera, pues debido a su falta de oportunidades laborales, se vio en la necesidad de crear su propio negocio, una tienda en la que le ofrece a sus clientes gran variedad de productos, ubicada en su vecindario en un barrio de Itagüí. 

Llegar a tener otro almacén que ofrezca productos de ferretería y lograr mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia es el sueño de esta emprendedora y para lograrlo día a día trabaja largas jornadas, desde las 11:00 de la mañana hasta las 8:00 de la noche, pero para ella este no es un sacrificio sino la manera de alcanzar sus sueños y de superarse. Sin embargo, se siente privilegiada por no tener que cumplir un horario de trabajo, ni un jefe a quien rendirle cuenta ya que ella puede disponer de su tiempo según las circunstancias que se le presenten en el camino

Debido a su gran vocación emprendedora, y sus ganas de que su negocio crezca, Blanca solicita un préstamo que brinde la oportunidad de incrementar sus ingresos y que su microempresa cada vez sea mas reconocida tanto en la vecindad como en la ciudad en general.
texts.en:
Blanca Nubia Cortez Céspedes has always been considered to be a fighter.  Due to the lack of job opportunities, she saw the need to create her own business, a store in which she offers her customers a large variety of products located in her neighborhood in Itagui.

The dream of this enterprising woman is to become the owner of a small hardware store, so that she can improve the quality of life for her family.  To do this she works long hours each day, from 11am until 8pm, but for her this is not a sacrifice, but rather a means of achieving her dreams and becoming successful.  However, she feels privileged in that she does not have a set job schedule or have to account to a boss, so that she can use all of her time to take advantage of the circumstances that present themselves along the way.  Because of her great entrepreneurial spirit and her desire to make her business grow, Blanca requests a loan that will provide her with the opportunity to increase her income and make her business better known, both in her neighborhood and in the city in general.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her store

loans.name: Carmen Rosa

texts.es: La Sra.  Carmen es de buena actitud ella trabaja sacrificadamente conjuntamente con su esposo Antonio, se dedican a la venta de refrescos y cerveza en las distintas fiestas de las zonas de la ciudad de la Paz, viven en la zona chijini,  es una señora dedicada  a su familia y además hace estudiar a su  hijo que esta estudiando en la Universidad, con el dinero del crédito comprara refrescos por mayor para ir a vender a una de las fiestas de la zona.  Ella se siente beneficiada de ser elegida su crédito como  crédito Kiva y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Carmen has a good attitude and works very hard along with her husband, Antonio.  She has a business selling soft drinks and beer at various events in the neighborhoods of the city of La Paz.  Her family lives in the Chijini neighborhood.  She is very devoted to her family, and also to the education of her son who is studying at the University.  With the money from this loan, she will buy soft drinks at wholesale to sell at events in the neighborhood.  She feels fortunate to be chosen to receive this Kiva loan, and is grateful for the support provided.

loans.use: to buy cases of drinks

loans.name: Estebana De La Concepcion

texts.es: Estebana de la Concepción tiene su pulpería. Hace más 15 años que tiene este negocio, la mayoría de sus clientes llegan a su vivienda en busca de los diferentes productos que ofrece, siempre esta preocupándose por brindar un buen servicio y sus clientes se encuentren satisfechos. Ella tiene 3 hijos menores de edad a su cargo, con el paso del tiempo les ha enseñado a ganarse la vida de una forma muy honrada. Es por este motivo que realiza el crédito para la compra de sopas, enlatados, fósforos, pan, cremas, granos básicos y detergente.
texts.en: Estebana de la Concepción has her own grocery store.  She has had this business for more than 15 years, and most of her customers come to her store looking for the different products that she offers.  She is always concerned about providing good service and satisfying her customers.  She has 3 minor children in her care, and over time she has taught them to earn a living in an honest way.  She will use the proceeds of this loan to purchase soups, canned goods, matches, bread, creams, staple grains and detergent.

loans.use: to buy soups, canned goods, matches, bread, creams, staple grains and detergent

loans.name: Susan Yatta's Group

texts.en:
Meet teachers of The SLC (Sierra Leone Church) Primary School, situated in Kenema, a city in eastern Sierra Leone. SLC Primary School was built in 1909 by the Anglican Mission. SLC primary school is staffed with 42 teachers and has an enrollment of 1,025 pupils.  This is the first loan that teachers of SLC primary school are accessing from SMT/Kiva lenders.  With the help of this loan, these teachers’ standard of living will improve.
